name: Shotgun Sumo
description:
Shotgun Sumo is a very silly 1v1 multiplayer action game in which the goal is simple: knock your opponent out of the arena.

Originally made for course CSC404 at the University of Toronto.

Team Development

Logan Pladl - Team Lead/Game Design

Peter Roubatsis - Lead Developer

Game - Art

Oleksandra Plaksina - Environment design, and environment concept.

Richard Menezes - Environment design.

Carolina Campos Buzato - Environment design.

Daniel Correa Londono - Character design.

Kimoon Rho - Environment design.

3D Animation

Yeongsuk Oh - Main character modeling and rigging.

Yourim Kim - Main character concept design. Animation

Soojee Park - Animation

Music

Ankit Nakul Mastakar - Composition, Production & Sound Design/Mixing

Dawson Andrew Chamberlain - Composition, Production & Sound Design/Mixing
